rooms.name: Mukhamandapam (Entrance Hall)
rooms.description: A welcoming space with traditional Kerala woodwork and stone finish, designed to adhere to Vastu principles by aligning the entrance with the auspicious direction.

rooms.name: Drawing Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area for family gatherings. Features traditional Kerala-style carvings and openable windows to enhance natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom with attached bathroom, oriented towards the north for positive energy as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom that adheres to traditional Kerala design principles with ample storage and a private window outlook.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom designed for guest use or family member, ensuring balanced energy flow in the layout.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet traditional Kerala kitchen setup with local materials and an emphasis on natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the drawing room, designed for meals and family interactions with ample seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A small but comfortable living area for the servant, ensuring privacy and ease of access to necessary amenities.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-ventilated bathroom with traditional Kerala fixtures aligned in compliance with local building norms.

rooms.name: Balcony / Verandah
rooms.description: Open space that complements the drawing room and serves as a transition zone between indoors and outdoors, ensuring natural light and ventilation.

openings.description: A grand wooden door with traditional Kerala motifs, aligning with Vastu for a welcoming energy flow.
Louvered windows designed to maximize cross ventilation and ensure privacy while enhancing the natural light, following local norms.
Dedicated door ensuring easy access yet maintaining privacy for the servant's living area.
